attributes.action: Take action to reduce light pollution!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Help to save our skies!

Not only is light pollution reducing our ability to view the night sky but it is causing a great impact on our wildlife.

Bar the Netherlands, the UK is more brightly lit than any other European country.  It wastes energy and is wasting the view of the night sky for everyone!
